Heyas!!!

Welcome to this RPG!!!

you are allowed to use around 5 characters, by now. If you want to 
check that or other rule, you should check it in the RPG's site ( 
http://nbwrpg.com ) or speak with Rauq and/or the others moderators.

Welcome here :)



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Dave Finnamore" <dfinnamore@h...> wrote:
> Hello all.  I have been in the group for a bit now, and just 
deciding when to come in.  I am a long time TF fan, since way back in 
G1 days.  Also, I broke into PBeM role playing about a year ago, and 
it's one of my hobbies.  Anyway, I have finally made my decision.  
Due to being a former WCW(a wrestling company) in 1996, I have 
decided I will join the New World Order.  I will make characters for 
other groups soon though.  Seeing as how they like to base their 
characters on wrestlers, I will stick with the trend.  I'm not sure 
how many characters we are allowed to have, but it looks like some 
people have a small handful, so I will just start off with three.  
Savage, Wrath and Crush, if you will.
